


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.is -->
<!-- @name    isColor -->

# ```js isColor ```


Check if the passed value is a color

## Parameters

- **value**  Mixed: The value to check



## Example (js)

```js
import isColor from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/is/color';
isColor('red') => true
isColor('#fff') => true
isColor('hello') => false
```
